howTos.title: How to set Shared folder in a Network
howTos.preRequest: you must have setted a network of computers. prepared
howTos.info: this will teach you to set a shared folder in a networks of computers so that \n users could shere files accross the network.
howTos.timeStamp: <built-in method now of type object at 0x00007FFD5E5EB530>
howTos.content:
open any folder 
 next Right click on the folder then go to the Properties. 
 then find a "share" tab on the task bar off the propertie window then go to it. 
 then selelct the access to "every one" in the drop down so that any one in the network will access it then its done!! now its done
